title: 求1.8版本+的自动铺轨机
txt_content:
可以自动清楚前面方块  （最好可以铺动力铁轨
)

replies.author: 小白勇者
replies.txt_content:
您好,
请在输入了命令summon MinecartCommandBlock ~1 ~ ~ {Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"/setblock ~2 ~1 ~ air"},Command:"/setblock ~2 ~ ~ air"},Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-1 ~ redstone_block"},Command:"/setblock ~1 ~ ~ activator_rail"},Command:"/setblock ~ ~ ~ golden_rail"}的命令方块东面放置下有红石块的东西朝向的激活铁轨并激活命令方块来生成向东铺设动力铁轨的命令方块矿车。
请在输入了命令summon MinecartCommandBlock ~ ~ ~1 {Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"/setblock ~ ~1 ~2 air"},Command:"/setblock ~ ~ ~2 air"},Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Command:"/setblock ~ ~ ~1 activator_rail"},Command:"/setblock ~ ~ ~ golden_rail"}的命令方块南面放置下有红石块的南北朝向的激活铁轨并激活命令方块来生成向南铺设动力铁轨的命令方块矿车。
请在输入了命令summon MinecartCommandBlock ~-1 ~ ~ {Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"/setblock ~-2 ~1 ~ air"},Command:"/setblock ~-2 ~ ~ air"},Command:"/setblock ~-1 ~-1 ~ redstone_block"},Command:"/setblock ~-1 ~ ~ activator_rail"},Command:"/setblock ~ ~ ~ golden_rail"}的命令方块西面放置下有红石块的东西朝向的激活铁轨并激活命令方块来生成向西铺设动力铁轨的命令方块矿车。
请在输入了命令summon MinecartCommandBlock ~ ~ ~-1 {Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"/setblock ~ ~1 ~-2 air"},Command:"/setblock ~ ~ ~-2 air"},Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~-1 redstone_block"},Command:"/setblock ~ ~ ~-1 activator_rail"},Command:"/setblock ~ ~ ~ golden_rail"}的命令方块北面放置下有红石块的南北朝向的激活铁轨并激活命令方块来生成向北铺设动力铁轨的命令方块矿车。
若您还有任何其它疑问请向我发送消息,我会尽量为您解答。

FHC红石 发表于 2015-3-27 20:20
http://mc.ahgame.com/gl/2015011498952_3.shtml
差评 1.8+没用的

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
1138074543 发表于 2015-3-28 10:27
差评 1.8+没用的
你不会把物品ID改成英文吗…………
就是楼上的指令了……
